text: John, I've never told anyone this, but my childhood was really tough after my parents' divorce. I trust you with this.
The trip to the Evergreen Botanical Gardens was amazing! We should definitely go back when the cherry blossoms are blooming. :)
Can't stop thinking about how peaceful it was at the gardens. It's like we were in a different world away from all the stress.
I'm so glad you're in my life, you make everything better. Thanks for being there for me.
Hey, let's plan something special for our 6-month anniversary coming up!
